template.name: Template Zimbra Statistics
template.description:
Need script in zabbix/scripts and cron task
Stats Collection One of the coolest things about working with ZCS is that it exposes you to many technologies such as Java, Postfix, OpenLDAP, and MySQL. An administrator of a ZCS system should have a working knowledge of these technologies, in order to monitor the system and solve performance problems.
https://wiki.zimbra.com/wiki/Server_Monitoring
